alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dillon, Darlington and Marlboro Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1119 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunbar to near Clyde. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, Dillon, Darlington, North Hartsville, Dovesville, Hamer, Mont Clare, Brownsville, Oak Grove, Lydia, Darlington Raceway, Auburn, Swift Creek, Clyde, Bingham, Mechanicsville, Oats, Floyd, Little Rock and Kellytown. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 183 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
